_source.short_desc:
The smarter way for small businesses to do great work
Keap organizes your client information & daily work in one place, freeing you up
_source.long_desc: Grow your business with the all-in-one CRM, sales & marketing software for serious business owners. Our platform organizes your customer information and daily work in one place, freeing you up from repetitive tasks so you have more time to focus on growing your business.
_source.pricing_details:
Keap is available across three pricing plans, outlined below:

Lite: $79/month
Pro: $159/month
Max: $159/month
_source.target_audience: Freelancers/self-employed, micro-enterprise, Small businesses, medium-sized companies, Large companies

related_products.short_desc: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that drives rep productivity on the world's #1 CRM platform.
related_products.features: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that has helped power the world's best sales teams on the world's #1 CRM platform. Firms of all sizes, industries, and geographies, realize value faster with Sales Cloud 360. Increase rep productivity with data driven selling by quickly deploying industry-specific apps and best practice processes.  You also get access to 150,000+ sales organizations and a 2 million user-strong community that are passionate about sales growth.

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Zoho CRM empowers SMBs & enterprises with a 360? customer relationship lifecycle management solution built on an omnichannel platform.
related_products.features: Zoho CRM empowers SMBs & enterprises with a 360? customer relationship lifecycle management solution. Key features include contact management, sales funnels, pipeline management, workflow automation, AI-powered conversational assistant, task management, managing marketing campaigns, sales forecasting, customer support & service, inventory management, reporting & analytics, and seamlessly integrate with 500+ popular business apps in a single business system.

related_products.short_desc: HubSpot CRM has everything you need to organize, track, and build better relationships with leads and customers.
related_products.features: Whether you've got a small team of five or a sophisticated sales force of 500, HubSpot offers pricing and packaging options that grow with you. HubSpot customer relationship management (CRM) software is built for companies that want to spend less time logging data. It keeps all your contacts in one centralized, customizable database. And you can see everything about a lead in one place -- no more digging through inboxes to find information. Start using the free HubSpot CRM today.

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the future of work - it's one app to replace them all. ClickUp is the #1 fastest growing productivity app in 2022.
related_products.features:
ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that eliminates work silos. It's the hub where teams come together to plan, organize, and collaborate on work using tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, Whiteboards, and more. 

Easily customized with just a few clicks, ClickUp helps teams of all types and sizes deliver work more effectively. By replacing inflexible and overlapping tools, ClickUp helps teams save one day each week!

related_products.short_desc: Pipedrive is an easy to implement CRM software tool that helps you focus on the activities that drive deals to close.
related_products.features: Pipedrive is a sales-focused customer relationship management tool that teams of all sizes love using. With 100'000+ paying customers spanning across 179 countries, sales teams are drawn in by our CRMs simple yet powerful design that prioritizes usability above all else. When using Pipedrive, nothing falls through the cracks, allowing your team to spend less time filing and more time selling with a CRM software that is both agile and powerful.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you -- everywhere you work.
related_products.features: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you by automatically combining your contacts, communication histories, email inboxes, and calendar appointments with over 250+ SaaS business app contacts and social media connections (including Linkedin, Twitter, Facebook) into one unified team relationship manager.

related_products.short_desc: ActiveCampaign CRM helps you sell more in less time by combining automated lead prioritization, task creation, and contact management.
related_products.features: ActiveCampaign's CRM combines contact organization with sales automation, helping you sell more in less time. Prioritize your leads, keep track of your tasks, and automate contact management so nothing falls through the cracks. See your whole sales process at a glance and track every interaction, keeping your team on the same page. Features like lead scoring, win probability, and automated segmentation combined with marketing automation turns your team into a well-oiled, deal-closing machine.

related_products.short_desc: Run your business your way with a fully integrated CRM for small to medium sized businesses.
related_products.features: Stay organized as you scale and grow. Finally, a CRM that?s easy to use, fully customizable and puts you in control of how you manage your leads, customers, tasks, team, projects, marketing and more. Create your free account to start customizing your CRM today.

similar_products.short_desc: TigerLRM is an all-in-one Sales Enablement Software with tools for Content Management, Training & Coaching, In-Built CRM, and more.

similar_products.short_desc:
Every CRM tool you need to manage clients, proposals, contracts, invoices, payments, and more. 

Use code "ONLY1" to start for $1/mo.
similar_products.features:
The go-to CRM for independent professionals-that's HoneyBook.

HoneyBook makes it easy to book more clients, manage projects, and get paid all in one place.

With proposals, invoices, contracts, payments, and scheduling at your fingertips, you have everything you need to give clients a great experience.

Get your first 6 months for just $1/mo with code "ONLY1".

similar_products.short_desc: monday sales CRM empowers sales teams to manage every aspect of their sales cycle and customer data in one centralized place.
similar_products.features: Perfect for small-medium businesses, monday sales CRM is a no-code fully-customizable CRM built on top of monday.com Work OS. Dubbed the CRM without the frustration, it handles all sales processes and client communication in one place. From capturing leads, managing contact info, tracking deals or collaborating across departments, monday sales CRM lets you manage it all. You can use built-in automations or easily create your own to streamline any manual work so you can focus more time on sales.

VipeCloud is the Sales CRM with Marketing Suite that builds rapport with you. Our All-In-One solution includes CRM, Email Marketing, Social Posting, Texting, Video Email, Integrations, and More.

With VipeCloud's single solution + rapport building, your business will increase efficiency and accelerate growth. It's no surprise 99% of customers rate our support at 4+ stars.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contact Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contact Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contact Management software provides powerful tools that enable storage, tracking, and management of contact information throughout an organization. Contact Management applications allow organizations to function more effectively by distributing current contact information for customers, contractors, vendors and others to all levels and locations of an organization. Contact Management solutions also often incorporate efficiency-increasing features such as lead management tools, employee task logs and customer interaction histories. Contact Management software is related to Campaign Management software, Lead Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Lead Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Lead Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Lead Management software enables the forecasting, collection and tracking of sales leads. Through the use of Lead Management solutions, organizations can automate and manage their prospect database as well as share and distribute leads throughout the enterprise. Organizations can also use Lead Management tools to track the progress of leads, analyze the performance of sales staff and marketing campaigns and develop new leads from their existing customer base. Lead Management software is related to Contact Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Automation software enables organizations to automate their marketing functions including campaign creation, market segmentation and response analysis. These applications also allow greater integration between sales staff and management as well as expanded abilities to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. Marketing Automation solutions enable the enterprise-wide sharing of information, providing an essential conduit between management, sales and marketing operations. Marketing Automation software is related to Campaign Management software, Email Marketing software and Search Marketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Force Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Force Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Force Automation software manages an organization's sales force functions which can include: lead management, customer account management, contact management, quote management, forecasting, customer demographics and employee performance management. Sales Force Automation applications improve sales productivity while providing a method of distribution for sales analytics throughout an enterprise. Sales Force Automation software is related to Commission software, Contact Management software, Lead Management software and Quoting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Tracking software enables businesses and sales teams to monitor pipelines, manage steps in the sales process, and track key performance numbers.

supported_countries.name: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

pricing_plans.name: Lite
pricing_plans.description: The Lite plan allows up to 500 contacts and 1 user with additional users available for $30 each.

pricing_plans.name: Pro
pricing_plans.description: The Pro plan allows up to 1500 contacts and 2 users with additional users available for $30 each.

pricing_plans.name: Max
pricing_plans.description: The Pro plan allows up to 2500 contacts and 3 users with additional users available for $30 each.

_source.short_desc:
The smarter way for small businesses to do great work
Keap organizes your client information & daily work in one place, freeing you up
_source.long_desc: Grow your business with the all-in-one CRM, sales & marketing software for serious business owners. Our platform organizes your customer information and daily work in one place, freeing you up from repetitive tasks so you have more time to focus on growing your business.
_source.pricing_details:
Keap is available across three pricing plans, outlined below:

Lite: $79/month
Pro: $159/month
Max: $159/month
_source.target_audience: Freelancers/self-employed, micro-enterprise, Small businesses, medium-sized companies, Large companies

related_products.short_desc: Follow up on every opportunity and win new business by creating professional, customisable, online quotes or estimates on the spot.
related_products.features: Xero helps you win new business by creating beautiful, customised quotes on the spot. Never miss an opportunity by sending quotes to your prospective customers as soon as you've discussed the work they'd like done. Customers can accept, decline or comment on the quote with the click of a button, then you can easily edit and resend if you need to. Once the job is done, simply create an invoice from your quote, which they can easily pay online.

related_products.short_desc: Build, track, and eSign your docs all in one place using legally binding online signatures.
related_products.features: Need to send out accurate proposals that will impress your clients without spending an hour or more on each one? PandaDoc allows you to create new quotes right inside your CRM with a single click, track quote views and signatures once theyre sent, and accept payment via secure credit card transaction fields.

related_products.short_desc: The fastest, easiest, and highest value Quoting Software. Automate everything from customer estimates to getting paid.
related_products.features: mHelpDesk is the easiest and most powerful solution for your business, automating everything from first customer quotes all the way to getting paid. We provide our customers with mobile and online tools that are unmatched in performance, reliability, and functionality. We've packed the best tools into one extremely easy-to-use and affordable package that requires no big upfront investment. And we have in-house product experts to get you up and running immediately.

related_products.short_desc: Jobber is perfect for home service businesses that want to keep jobs on track and provide a seamless customer experience. Try it free!
related_products.features: Jobber keeps your jobs on track and your customers informed. Send quotes and invoices by text and email, schedule jobs more efficiently, and optimize routes. Give your crew the job details they need, see where they are, and get notified when a job is done. Send automatic payment reminders and take payments instantly in-person, online within 24 hours, or automatically every month. With a mobile app, free training, and simple setup, Jobber helps you save time while delivering 5-star service.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 is #1 free CRM with built in quotes and invoices. Unlimited quotes and invoices 100% free. 8 million clients worldwide.
related_products.features: If you are looking for free quotation and invoices software, you are in the right place. Bitrix24 is a free CRM with unlimited quotes and invoices. Unlike other free quotation invoice solutions, Bitrix24 quotes and invoices are fully customizable and come with powerful tools, like multiple currency support, taxes, automatic numbering, product catalog and email marketing.

related_products.short_desc: Fully integrated, automated, and easy-to-use interface designed to help users sell faster, communicate quicker, and maximize profits.
related_products.features: Sell faster, communicate more efficiently, and maximize profits with Odoo Sales. Quickly send polished quotations, with an easy-to-use eSignature feature and online payment options. Odoo Sales is fully integrated with other Odoo apps, and automates a number of time-consuming tasks, thus freeing users to focus on customer relationships and revenue.

related_products.short_desc:
Ready to level up your business? 

Be more efficient, profitable ????, organized, and automated. 

Free consultation.???? Free trial.
related_products.features:
Running a successful business doesn't have to be stressful. Our customizable software and services make it easy for you and your team to stay connected and scale your business. 

With the JobNimbus platform, you can fully customize your workflow and hone in on all your business processes. 

Boost your team's efficiency with cutting-edge features our customers love, like our Boards tool, automation options, and mobile app.

Try JobNimbus 2 Weeks for free, no credit card is required.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud based custom manufacturing solution with quoting, business intelligence, employee management, and more.
related_products.features:
ShopVOX is a comprehensive web-based, easy to use management solution for custom fabricators.

Our solution includes everything you need to run your shop - sales lead tracking, quoting, work orders, purchase orders, job management and scheduling, online proof approvals, Quickbooks integration, business intelligence, online credit card payments through Authorize.net, and much more.

Perfect for
- Sign companies
- Printing companies
- Apparel companies
- Custom manufacturers
- Job shops

related_products.short_desc: Invoice2go makes it easy to send invoices & estimates, accept online payments and manage your business. Free 30 day trial.
related_products.features:
Send professional invoices and estimates with Invoice2go.  Try it free for 30 days.

Easily create and send custom invoices with a few clicks, accept payments online and manage your business at-a-glance with business insights reporting.  

Looking for more tools to run your business? Invoice2go also features appointment scheduling, time tracking, expense tracking and more.  

Try our newest profiles and review features to increase visibility online and earn customer trust.

related_products.short_desc: Scoro is an end-to-end work management solution that enables you to control your entire workflow in one place.
related_products.features:
Scoro is an award-winning end-to-end work management solution that enables you to control your entire workflow in one place.

In addition to project management features, Scoro provides all the tools you need to fully manage your business: work & task scheduling and tracking, collaboration, contact database & CRM, quoting and billing, advanced reporting, real-time dashboards, and much more. Sign up for a 14-day free trial to see for yourself!

related_products.short_desc: Automate quoting, accept payments, and increase your conversion rate with Better Proposals.
related_products.features: Better Proposals is an all-in-one digital document solution for businesses that want to streamline their sales processes. With its intuitive and easy-to-use editor, it lets you create and send your quotes in just a few minutes. Say goodbye to manual entry thanks to its CRM integrations and accept payments through Stripe, GoCardless, and PayPal.

similar_products.short_desc: Are lengthy quote times eroding buyer interest? Reduce time-to-quote with DealHub's award-winning Quoting (CPQ) software.
similar_products.features:
Are lengthy quote times eroding buyer interest? Reduce time-to-quote with DealHub's award-winning quoting software. DealHub's highly intuitive quoting solution minimizes administrative tasks and streamlines sales operations to reduce the sales cycle and increase revenue.

Native integration with your CRM (Microsoft Dynamics, Salesforce and Freshworks).

similar_products.short_desc: Streamline your business operations by changing how you quote and sell configurable products and services.
similar_products.features: Configure One has the tools to provide comprehensive quotes for customers. Include line items for fully priced configurations, view and edit bills of material from the quoting interface, manage customers, and generate dynamic quote documents.

similar_products.short_desc: Jobber is perfect for home service businesses that want to keep jobs on track and provide a seamless customer experience. Try it free!
similar_products.features: Jobber keeps your jobs on track and your customers informed. Send quotes and invoices by text and email, schedule jobs more efficiently, and optimize routes. Give your crew the job details they need, see where they are, and get notified when a job is done. Send automatic payment reminders and take payments instantly in-person, online within 24 hours, or automatically every month. With a mobile app, free training, and simple setup, Jobber helps you save time while delivering 5-star service.

similar_products.short_desc: Quote & Proposal Automation Anytime, Anywhere designed for IT Solution Providers
similar_products.features: ConnectWise Sell offers IT solution providers of all sizes a cloud-based quoting solution that enables the quote-to-cash process to run smoothly. Key features help technology businesses quickly generate quotes, follow up on them, and turn them into revenue with ease. Tight integrations with leading CRMs like NetSuite, Salesforce, and ConnectWise Manage provide end-to-end visibility into the sales pipeline from quote and proposal creation to ordering, fulfillment, and billing.

similar_products.short_desc: Quotient streamlines the quoting process, making it easy to create, send, and manage quotes. Your customers will love it.
similar_products.features: Quotient is super-intuitive online quoting software that lets you create, send, and manage your quotes. You'll save time and make more money with Quotient. Available 100% securely anywhere on the Mac, Windows and iPhone/iPad. Quotient seamlessly integrates with Zapier, Xero, QuickBooks Online, Insightly, Capsule and MailChimp.

similar_products.short_desc: Build, track, and eSign your docs all in one place using legally binding online signatures.
similar_products.features: Need to send out accurate proposals that will impress your clients without spending an hour or more on each one? PandaDoc allows you to create new quotes right inside your CRM with a single click, track quote views and signatures once theyre sent, and accept payment via secure credit card transaction fields.

similar_products.short_desc: Ignition makes it simple to engage clients, get paid and run your business on autopilot. From impressive online proposals to automated
similar_products.features:
Ignition is a client engagement and commerce platform for professional services businesses to streamline how they engage clients and get paid. 

Businesses such as accounting and bookkeeping firms use Ignition to help them grow, be more efficient, and create win-win client relationships. 

With Ignition, you can easily win new business with impressive digital proposals, engage new and existing clients with a clear scope of work, and get paid on time by automating payment collection - all in one.

similar_products.short_desc: QuoteWerks is an easy-to-use quoting and proposal solution enabling companies of all sizes to streamline their sales process.
similar_products.features: QuoteWerks is an affordable turn-key quoting and proposal solution with over 88,000 Users in 101 countries. What sets QuoteWerks apart is its 55+ integrations with CRM (such as ACT!, Autotask, ConnectWise, salesforce, MS CRM, Outlook and more), Accounting (QuickBooks and Sage 50), Distributors (Ingram Micro, Tech Data, Synnex, and more), FedEx/UPS, Leasing, Sales Tax, Dell, Cisco, HP, CDW, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: GleanQuote makes complex quoting and proposals easy by helping with configuration, pricing, and proposal generation challenges.
similar_products.features:
GleanQuote helps teams that have configuration, pricing and proposal generation challenges. Our CPQ and Proposal Automation software is easy to implement and even easier to use and integrates seamlessly with the most popular CRMs.

Your team will be able to create, send and close even the most complex quotes and proposals in minutes. Sales and margins will go up. Wasted time and mistakes will go down.

similar_products.short_desc: Quote professional services in Salesforce using resource roles, rates, schedules, discounts and more. Generate documents & sync to PSA.
similar_products.features:
PSQuote enables your sales teams to quote services based exactly on how you deliver. Create Professional Services Quotes in Salesforce from an Opportunity using resource roles, rate cards, delivery schedules, packaged offerings, discounts, support for contractors, and more.
Includes adding materials and other fixed fee items. Setup billing schedules, create statements of work, plan margin, sync to downstream to PSA projects.

similar_products.short_desc: Quote smarter, faster and win more business. Create custom proposals in minutes (not days), and start making a better first impression.
similar_products.features: Trackfront enables you to respond faster to new opportunities with a custom proposal. Trackfront is different than most of the other simple estimating tools on the market. When others only get you so far, Trackfront gives you more of the robust features you need to handle your unique pricing requirements. It's an all-in-one solution that lets you create detailed pricing quotes with customizable multi-page proposal content, contract language and digital e-signature approval functionality.

similar_products.short_desc: Automate quoting, accept payments, and increase your conversion rate with Better Proposals.
similar_products.features: Better Proposals is an all-in-one digital document solution for businesses that want to streamline their sales processes. With its intuitive and easy-to-use editor, it lets you create and send your quotes in just a few minutes. Say goodbye to manual entry thanks to its CRM integrations and accept payments through Stripe, GoCardless, and PayPal.

similar_products.short_desc: Finally, a digital sales platform purpose-built for manufacturers that unites CPQ & Quoting with CRM & Commerce
similar_products.features:
Manufacturers, automate your quotes consistently accurate on 1 platform & find the best-match customer solution from standard to lot size 1. This is your ticket to exceeding buyer expectations, 24/7, across all channels.

Product Catalog & Smart Selling; Quote Automation, Workflows & Approvals; Product, Service & Solution Configuration; Interactive 2D/3D Visualization in CAD & Maps; Manufacturing Costing & Pricing

In Mind Cloud is the world's only digital sales platform made for manufacturers.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contract Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contract Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contract Management software automates the creation, tracking, and monitoring of contracts and agreements. Contract Management software also allows for the company-wide sharing of contract documents and management of differing document versions. These contract management applications often provide top-down control and monitoring of contract status, key dates, and personnel responsibilities. Contract Management software is related to Customer Relationship Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top CPQ software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of CPQ tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Configure Price Quote (CPQ) software helps large companies quickly provide accurate quotes based on fluctuating pricing and cost variables. CPQ software lets you provide customers with upselling and bundling options, achieve more accurate quotes based on global economic factors and inventory, and align your sales with a rapidly changing market. CPQ software is closely related to Sales Force Automation software, Product Configurator software, Job Costing software, Quoting software, and Proposal Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Job Costing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Job Costing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Job Costing software is designed to help businesses forecast and maintain records of project costs.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Product Configurator software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Product Configurator tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Product Configurator software automates the configuration of build-to-order products with multiple options. These applications, also known as Sales Configurator solutions, provide manufacturing operations with the capability to easily and efficiently produce highly customizable and configurable product lines. Product Configurator software instantly translates customers' product requests into real-time generated quotes, descriptions, images, bills of material and invoices. Typically Product Configurator applications are integrated with an eCommerce solution, allowing customers to create customized orders in real-time at the time of purchase. Product Configurator software is related to Manufacturing Execution Systems and MRP software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Proposal Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Proposal Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Proposal Management software helps companies manage the proposal and RFP process. Bidders may quickly create strong business proposals and responses to RFPs that are tailored to the needs of each proposal. This software is helpful in automating the more cumbersome aspects of proposal writing while maintaining a detailed and professional-looking document. Some Proposal Management software is also a good fit for companies that are soliciting proposals. In this case, the software helps to organize and evaluate various aspects of multiple proposals at once. Proposal Management software is related to Quoting software, Contract Management software, and Professional Services Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Force Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Force Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Force Automation software manages an organization's sales force functions which can include: lead management, customer account management, contact management, quote management, forecasting, customer demographics and employee performance management. Sales Force Automation applications improve sales productivity while providing a method of distribution for sales analytics throughout an enterprise. Sales Force Automation software is related to Commission software, Contact Management software, Lead Management software and Quoting software.

supported_countries.name: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

pricing_plans.name: Lite
pricing_plans.description: The Lite plan allows up to 500 contacts and 1 user with additional users available for $30 each.

pricing_plans.name: Pro
pricing_plans.description: The Pro plan allows up to 1500 contacts and 2 users with additional users available for $30 each.

pricing_plans.name: Max
pricing_plans.description: The Pro plan allows up to 2500 contacts and 3 users with additional users available for $30 each.
